name: Infinity Reader
subtitle: Novel Reader App
description: A feature-rich novel reader application built with Kotlin Multiplatform.

apps.name: Infinity
apps.subtitle: Novel Reader
apps.localizedDescription:
A beautiful and feature-rich novel reader app.

Features:
• Read novels from multiple sources
• Sync reading progress across devices
• Customizable reading experience
• Text-to-speech support
• Offline reading
• And much more!

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to save images and covers
privacy.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: Used to import and export books
